mapper.select: /* ilboSetting.xml selectSettingInfo */ SELECT setting_seq, admin_seq, ilbo_date, ilbo_date_width, worker_company_name, worker_company_name_width, worker_owner, worker_owner_width, ilbo_worker_view, ilbo_worker_view_width, worker_ilbo, worker_ilbo_width, ilbo_worker_name, ilbo_worker_name_width, ilbo_worker_feature, ilbo_worker_feature_width, ilbo_worker_memo, ilbo_worker_memo_width, ilbo_assign_type, ilbo_assign_type_width, ilbo_worker_info, ilbo_worker_info_width, ilbo_worker_status_info, ilbo_worker_status_info_width, ilbo_memo, ilbo_memo_width, work_company_name, work_company_name_width, work_owner, work_owner_width, ilbo_employer_view, ilbo_employer_view_width, employer_ilbo, employer_ilbo_width, employer_name, employer_name_width, ilbo_employer_feature, ilbo_employer_feature_width, addr_edit, addr_edit_width, addr_location, addr_location_width, ilbo_work_info, ilbo_work_info_width, ilbo_work_order_name, ilbo_work_order_name_width, ilbo_use_info, ilbo_use_info_width, ilbo_status_info, ilbo_status_info_width, ilbo_work_breakfast_yn, ilbo_work_breakfast_yn_width, ilbo_work_age_min, ilbo_work_age_min_width, ilbo_work_age, ilbo_work_age_width, ilbo_work_blood_pressure, ilbo_work_blood_pressure_width, manager_name, manager_name_width, manager_phone, manager_phone_width, ilbo_work_manager_name, ilbo_work_manager_name_width, ilbo_work_manager_phone, ilbo_work_manager_phone_width, ilbo_work_arrival, ilbo_work_arrival_width, ilbo_work_finish, ilbo_work_finish_width, work_ilbo, work_ilbo_width, work_name, work_name_width, ilbo_kind_name, ilbo_kind_name_width, ilbo_job_comment, ilbo_job_comment_width, ilbo_chief_memo, ilbo_chief_memo_width, ilbo_income_name, ilbo_income_name_width, ilbo_income_time, ilbo_income_time_width, ilbo_unit_price, ilbo_unit_price_width, ilbo_fee, ilbo_fee_width, share_fee, share_fee_width, ilbo_deduction, ilbo_deduction_width, ilbo_pay, ilbo_pay_width, ilbo_pay_name, ilbo_pay_name_width, ilbo_pay_time, ilbo_pay_time_width, ilbo_income_memo, ilbo_income_memo_width, employer_rating, employer_rating_width, evaluate_grade, evaluate_grade_width, use_yn, use_yn_width, reg_date, reg_date_width, reg_admin, reg_admin_width, owner_id, owner_id_width, setting_use_yn, setting_del_yn, setting_reg_date, setting_reg_admin, setting_mod_admin, setting_mod_date, company_name, company_name_width, ilbo_work_breaktime, ilbo_work_breaktime_width, ilbo_career_name, ilbo_career_name_width, receive_contract_seq, receive_contract_seq_width, labor_contract_seq, labor_contract_seq_width, work_fee, work_fee_width, worker_fee, worker_fee_width, fee_info, fee_info_width, pay_info, pay_info_width, manager_rating, manager_rating_width, surrogate, surrogate_width, labor_contract, labor_contract_width, deductible_sum, deductible_sum_width, deductible_info, deductible_info_width, wages_received, wages_received_width, employer_detail, employer_detail_width, parking_option, parking_option_width FROM tbl_ilbo_setting WHERE admin_seq = #{admin_seq }
